name: nextjs-shadcn
description: Next.js + shadcn/ui with all components (D1 database)

agentContext.summary: A Next.js app with all shadcn/ui components pre-installed, Tailwind CSS v4, and D1 database.
agentContext.full_text:
## Project Structure

- `app/` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `components/ui/` - All shadcn/ui components (57 components pre-installed)
- `components/` - App-level components (sidebar, charts, nav, login form)
- `components.json` - shadcn/ui configuration
- `lib/utils.ts` - Utility functions (cn helper)
- `hooks/` - Custom React hooks
- `public/` - Static assets
- `open-next.config.ts` - OpenNext configuration
- `wrangler.jsonc` - Worker configuration with D1 database

## Commands

- `bun run dev` - Local development
- `jack ship` - Deploy to production
- `bun run preview` - Preview production build locally

## shadcn/ui

All components are pre-installed in `components/ui/`. Import them directly:

```tsx
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"
import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
```

Add new components: `bunx shadcn@latest add [component]`

Add pre-built blocks (full page layouts): `bunx shadcn@latest add dashboard-01`

Configuration: `components.json` (style: new-york, base-color: zinc)

**shadcn/ui AI reference:** Fetch https://ui.shadcn.com/llms.txt for the full component and block documentation index. For component-specific docs, use https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/[name].

## Pre-built Pages

- `/dashboard` - Full dashboard with sidebar, charts, and data table (from `dashboard-01` + `sidebar-07` blocks)
- `/login` - Login form with social providers (from `login-03` block)

## Database

D1 SQLite database is available as `DB` binding. Access it in server components and API routes via `getCloudflareContext()`.

## Conventions

- Uses App Router (not Pages Router)
- SSR and SSG work out of the box
- Server Components supported
- Tailwind CSS v4 with CSS variables for theming

## OpenNext on Cloudflare â€” Important Rules

This app runs via OpenNext on Cloudflare Workers. Follow these rules:

### Use window.location.href instead of router.push() for full-page transitions
OpenNext has a broken webpack chunk URL resolver. `router.push()` to pages whose chunks aren't loaded fails with `ChunkLoadError`. Use `window.location.href` for auth state changes or cross-section navigation. `<Link>` components work fine.

### Add `export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic'` to pages using getCloudflareContext()
Without this, static prerendering fails because `getCloudflareContext()` is only available at request time.

### Edge middleware cannot use Node.js APIs
Do not import Node.js built-in modules in middleware.
